Title: The Path of Dissonance
Description:
Hannan is correct only in that my presence here is not... strictly allowed.

But this corruption echoes in my mind, like a disruptive chord in the otherwise pure song of the world. Like a cry for help.

I must heed that call. I must follow the dissonance to its source and find the heart of it, so that I may discover how to cleanse it.

Join me.
ObjectivesText: Meet Orweyna and Hannan outside the Salien Gutters cave.
CompletionText: You have proven to be formidable. I am sure we can find a way to eliminate what extractors we come across.
RewardText:
<Orweyna gives a concerned glance toward the cave.>

When he agreed to come with me... I was supposed to watch over him. Make sure nothing bad happened.

Objectives.Text: Meet Orweyna in the Salien Gutters
